heroDescription: Minneapolis, a vibrant city known for its arts and culture, boasts a diverse economy and a strong community spirit.
landscapeDescription: Minneapolis has a dynamic economy with a mix of industries including finance, healthcare, and technology. The city is a hub for innovation and entrepreneurship.
uniqueNeeds: Minneapolis requires a focus on tech diversification, affordable housing, and sustainable urban development.
citySpecificRiskAdvice: Minneapolis faces tech concentration risks; diversify investments. Real estate is volatile; monitor housing prices. Prepare for winter storms and flooding.

sections.title: Economic Growth

sections.title: Wealth Demographics

sections.title: Advisor Specializations

sections.title: Cost of Living

sections.title: Real Estate Market
sections.description: According to Zillow (2024), Minneapolis housing prices have risen 8% year-over-year, indicating a competitive market with potential bubble risks.

sections.title: Business Environment
sections.description: According to Fortune (2024), Minneapolis ranks high for business climate, with strong support for startups and established firms alike.
